404.title: Page not found
404.subtext_html: We're sorry, but the page you're looking for could not be found. Go back to our {{ link }}, or check out some of our favourite items below:

cart.empty: You don't have any items in your cart yet.

shipping_calculator.rates_html: There are {{ number_of_rates }} shipping rates available for {{ address }}, starting at {{ rate }}.
shipping_calculator.rate: There is one shipping rate available for {{ address }}.
shipping_calculator.no_rates: We do not ship to this destination.

contact.success: Thanks for getting in touch! We'll respond to your message shortly.

orders.none: You haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.subtext: To activate your account, choose a password and enter it below.

login.error: Incorrect email address or password. Have a subscription but can't log in? Create an account using the email address tied to your subscription to manage your subscription at any time.

reset_password.subtext: Weâ€™ll send you an email to reset your password.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

product.error_message_stock: Unfortunately, we only have {{ stock }} in stock.
product.error_message_general: We were unable to add this product to your cart. Please try again later. Contact us if you continue to have issues.

onboarding.welcome_text_html: Welcome to your new store. Thank you for purchasing Atlantic. Right now, everything is turned off, so you'll want to head over to your {{ theme_settings_link }} page.
onboarding.featured_collections_text_html: You haven't set this up yet! Go to the {{ theme_settings_link }} to choose your collections.
onboarding.featured_products_text_html: You haven't selected a collection yet! Go to the {{ theme_settings_link }} and select a collection.
onboarding.featured_products_empty_text_html: No products in this collection. Go to the {{ collection_screen_link }} and add some products.
onboarding.no_products_text_html: Your store doesn't have any products yet! {{ new_product_link }} now.
onboarding.pages_sidebar_text_html: Add sidebar content via the {{ theme_settings_link }} page, or disable this sidebar entirely

order_summary.partial_total_label: Please note: USPS shipments may be delayed due to COVID-19.

contact.phone_tooltip: We'll only use your phone number if we need to contact you about your delivery.
